meanings.definition: A long, loose garment covering the whole body from head to feet, worn in public by many Muslim women.
meanings.sent1: She wore a burqa to the market to cover herself completely.
meanings.sent2: In some cultures, women wear a burqa as a traditional form of dress.
meanings.sent3: The burqa made her look like a mysterious ghost floating through the streets.
meanings.sent4: Her burqa was like a shield protecting her from the prying eyes of strangers.
meanings.sent5: The black burqa billowed in the wind, creating a striking silhouette against the bright sky.

meanings.definition: A garment resembling a burqa that covers the face.
meanings.sent1: She put on the burqa to hide her identity completely.
meanings.sent2: The mask she wore was more of a burqa, concealing her features.
meanings.sent3: The burqa-like veil made her feel like a mysterious spy on a secret mission.
meanings.sent4: Her face was hidden behind the burqa, leaving only her eyes visible.
meanings.sent5: The lace burqa draped over her face added an air of elegance to her outfit.
